features.name: Overall Community Dashboard
features.description: Main analytics dashboard showing overall community metrics including user engagement, content creation, and activity trends
test_scenarios: View dashboard with different time periods (daily, weekly, monthly, yearly)
Compare metrics between two time periods
Test dashboard loading with no data
Verify dashboard refreshes with new data
Test responsive layout on different screen sizes

features.name: Tag Statistics Analytics
features.description: Displays statistics about tag usage across community content with pagination support
features.ui_location: PersonaBar > Dashboard > Community Analytics > Tags Section
test_scenarios: View tag statistics for different time periods
Compare tag usage between time periods
Test empty state when no tags exist

features.name: Popular Content Analytics
features.description: Shows most popular content across the community with view counts and engagement metrics
features.ui_location: PersonaBar > Dashboard > Community Analytics > Popular Content Section
test_scenarios: View popular content for different time periods
Click through to actual content items

features.name: Top Community Users Display
features.description: Displays top community contributors with their engagement metrics and avatars
features.ui_location: PersonaBar > Dashboard > Community Analytics > Top Users Section
test_scenarios: Navigate to user profiles on click
Test empty state when no users

features.name: Answers Module Analytics
features.description: Analytics dashboard specifically for the Answers module showing Q&A metrics
features.ui_location: PersonaBar > Dashboard > Community Analytics > Answers Tab

features.name: Blogs Module Analytics
features.description: Analytics dashboard for blog content including post views, comments, and engagement
features.ui_location: PersonaBar > Dashboard > Community Analytics > Blogs Tab

features.name: Discussions Module Analytics
features.description: Analytics for discussion forums showing thread activity and participation metrics
features.ui_location: PersonaBar > Dashboard > Community Analytics > Discussions Tab

features.name: Social Events Module Analytics
features.description: Analytics for social events including attendance, engagement, and event popularity
features.ui_location: PersonaBar > Dashboard > Community Analytics > Social Events Tab

features.name: Ideas Module Analytics
features.description: Analytics for idea submissions showing voting patterns and idea popularity
features.ui_location: PersonaBar > Dashboard > Community Analytics > Ideas Tab

features.name: Wiki Module Analytics
features.description: Analytics for wiki content including page edits, contributors, and content growth
features.ui_location: PersonaBar > Dashboard > Community Analytics > Wiki Tab

features.name: Time Period Selection
features.description: Interface for selecting analytics time periods and date ranges for all analytics views
features.ui_location: PersonaBar > Dashboard > Community Analytics > Date Selector
test_scenarios: Select predefined periods (day, week, month, year)
Verify data updates on period change

features.name: Comparative Analytics
features.description: Compare analytics data between two different time periods to identify trends
features.ui_location: PersonaBar > Dashboard > Community Analytics > Comparison View

features.name: Role-Based Access Control
features.description: Controls access to analytics based on user roles and permissions

features.name: Module Context Data API
features.description: API endpoint for retrieving contextual data specific to individual modules
test_scenarios: Retrieve context for each module type

features.name: Engagement Trend Indicators
features.description: Visual indicators showing engagement trends with up/down arrows and warnings
features.ui_location: PersonaBar > Dashboard > Community Analytics > Trend Indicators

features.name: Data Export Functionality
features.description: Export analytics data to various formats for external analysis
features.ui_location: PersonaBar > Dashboard > Community Analytics > Export Button

features.name: Analytics Data Caching
features.description: Caching mechanism for analytics data to improve performance

features.name: Portal-Specific Analytics
features.description: Isolation of analytics data per portal in multi-portal installations

features.name: Pagination Controls
features.description: Navigation controls for paginated data in tag statistics and popular content
features.ui_location: PersonaBar > Dashboard > Community Analytics > Paginated Sections
test_scenarios: Test with single page of data
